content: {"name": "Koinonia Foundation, Inc.", "alternate_name": "", "description": "By Appointment only\nPart of the Springfield an  Alexendria", "email": "", "url": null, "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "6037 Franconia Road", "address_2": null, "city": "Alexandria", "state_province": "VA", "postal_code": "22310", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 38.782088, "longitude": -77.144471}, "phones": [{"number": "(703) 971-1991", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "16:30"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "16:30"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "16:30"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "16:30"}, {"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "16:30"}, {"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "16:30"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of address required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clients can visit: Once a month"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of household income required"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Diapers upon availability"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clothing may be available"}]}
